sentence.Network_en: An ardent outset may be followed by declension.
sentence.Network_cn: 热情的开端可能继之以冷漠.

sentence.Network_en: In Latin, the nominative case of first declension nouns ends in'a '.
sentence.Network_cn: 在拉丁文中, 属于第一类词形变化的名词的主格以a结尾.

sentence.Network_en: Declension means varying the forms of nouns, pronouns and adjectives in a sentence.
sentence.Network_cn: 变格是指名词 、 代词和形容词在句中的形式变化.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在古英语中，名词的变格（declension）中分为三类，1，强变格，包括一切词干以元音结尾的词；2，弱变格，包括一切以辅音-n结尾 …
...重视不够，大多以形态学研究为主，而主要是以名词的词格变化（declensions）和动词的形态变化（conjugations）为重点。
衰落的相关英语词汇大全 - n词酷英汉词典 ... comedown 失落，衰败 declension 1. 词形变化 go to the dogs 详细.
近音词，连读，单词辩音用英文怎么说？_百度知道 ... case markings 格位标志 declension 语尾变化（曲用） Sanskrit 梵文.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English declinson, from Old French declinaison, from decliner 'to decline'. The change in the ending was probably due to association with words such as ascension

means.word_mean: 1. the inflection of nouns and pronouns and adjectives in Indo-European languages
2. process of changing to an inferior state
4. a class of nouns or pronouns or adjectives in Indo-European languages having the same (or very similar) inflectional forms;

auth_sentence.content: First of all, Chinese's "baby" grammar results because most conjugation and declension in modern languages is redundant.
auth_sentence.res_content: First of all, Chinese's "baby" grammar results because most conjugation and declension in modern languages is redundant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: First of all, Chinese's "baby" grammar results because most conjugation and declension in modern languages is redundant.
